title: Absolute extrema from graph of derivative

content.question: The figure above shows the graph of f', the derivative of a function f, for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BF1@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. What is the value of x at which the absolute minimum of f occurs?

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
